info.name: HPS_Nominal_iter0
info.comment: HPS detector for 2019 run with fieldmap, Tracker at nominal opening angle, no SVT survey, this detector uses the corrected fieldmap scaled to -1.022T for 4.5 GeV. Includes L0 and Hodoscope. ECAL with survey alignment for HPSEcal3 (global y/z translations). This detector has the full hierarchical alignment structure
